attributes.action: do everything in his power to safeguard an annual and permenant British Grand Prix
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorsport is about one of very few industries we the UK are still leading the way in, it is a very good advertisement as to the technical excellence of this country and if engineering (as it should be) is how we are to come out of the recession strong then we need to do everything to safeguard it's future. This means securing the place of the British Grand Prix at whichever venue for every season, to do so would cost a fraction of what is being spent on the Olympics and offer greater return, come on do something before we loose yet another industry to abroad and take another step toward becoming a third world country.
